alert.note: Alert for Crockett; Schleicher (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 15 at 2:45PM CDT until May 15 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Schleicher County in west central Texas... Northeastern Crockett County in west central Texas... * Until 345 PM CDT. * At 243 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Us-190 Near The Crockett-Schleicher County Line, or 17 miles southeast of Barnhart, moving west at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Us-190 Near The Crockett-Schleicher County Line The Intersection Of Us-190 And Ranch Road 1828. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
